import EditTask from '../components/EditTask' import { selectTask } from '../redux/actions/index' import AddTask from '../components/AddTask' import Menu from '../components/Menu' import BannerImage from '../components/BannerImage' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const Tasks = props => { const renderTasks = () => { return props.tsks.tsks.map(tsk => { return ( props.selectTask(tsk)}> {tsk.title} {tsk.startTime}-{tsk.endTime} {tsk.notes} ) }) } return ( <> {console.log(props)}
{renderTasks()}
Task Time Notes
{/*
*/}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { tsks: state.tsks, selectedTask: state.selectedTask } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { selectTask })(Tasks)
